News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 9th February
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 9th February
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 9th February
News.short_description: The Chigwell Construction Stadium will be hosting West Ham's U23 Premier League Cup fixture tonight, when they face Leicester City
News.description:
West Ham United’s under-23 side are back in action tonight at the Chigwell Construction Stadium when they host Leicester City at 7pm in a Premier League Cup game.

The two sides met back in October in a Premier League Cup game at Loughborough University, where the Hammers won 2-0 thanks to goals from Marcus Browne and Domingos Quina.

West Ham United U23 last Five Results:
Away v Blackburn L 2-1
Home v Aston Villa D 0-0
Away v Brighton L 0-3
Home v Norwich W 2-1
Away v Wolves W 4-0

Admission to all Hammers U23 games at the Chigwell Construction Stadium is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders with admission costing everyone else £5 for adults and £3 for concessions. The Clubhouse is also open to all supporters before and after the game.
